attributes.action: Please do not involve the U.K in air strikes on Syria. There are safer options!
attributes.additional_details:
There are numerous videos, images, blogs and letter available to us to show that innocent Syrian people are being killed by Air strikes and that we are encouraging people to join extremist groups with doing so. 

This link is but a small example of the terror these innocent victims face everyday..

https://www.facebook.com/video.php?v=1061479010536978
attributes.background:
Innocent people are being affected by the bombings in Syria, either through death, injury or loss of homes/possessions.

The U.K should be a country that is able to stand tall & say that we helped without the involvement of violence. Especially when we cannot guarentee the safety of the innocent.
